doc.title: Followed
doc.plot: The short is about an ordinary young man that is suffering from severe mental hallucinations. He is, however, not aware of that and is terrified of an unknown person that is chasing him. An accident put an end to the chasing and the protagonist lands in the hospital, where his doctor tells him off. He warns him not to forget his weekly treatment in the hospital. However, the doctor turns out to be corrupted and secretly initiates the next stage of his evil experiments with new medication. The consequences are shocking for both the protagonist and his girlfriend.
